publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding
S1M-1924 Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club (lodged on 10 May 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-1924 Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club (lodged on 10 May 2001) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson

S1M-1924 Mr Brian Monteith: Congratulations to Stirling County Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling County Rugby Football Club on winning the second division championship and promotion to division one of the BT Scotland Premiership and also Stirling County’s under-18 team who became Scottish champions after winning the Youth League Cup final for a record fifth time. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson
